bookTitle: Teenage Murderer: Alyssa Bustamante (True Crime Bus Stop Reads, #29)
Plot: BUS STOP READS ARE SHORT QUICK READS TEENAGE MURDERER ALYSSA BUSTAMANTE Alyssa Bustamante, aged just 15, brutally murdered her six year old sisterâ€™s nine-year-old friend. Alyssa was born into a dysfunctional family. Both her parents were meth and marijuana users and she was eventually placed into the care of her grandparents. As she grew up she suffered from severe depression and self harming and was prescribed Prozac. She was sentenced, aged 18, to life in prison.
